sentences.english: you can re-invent yourself and reach new heights.
sentences.chinese: 你可以重塑自身，达到新的高度。

sentences.english: Signing up with Ferrari meant rebuilding my self-confidence in my own potential.
sentences.chinese: 和法拉利签约意味着在我的潜能中重塑自信。

sentences.english: How to reconstruct the spirit of the Tianzi Marina's landscape design is the issue of this article.
sentences.chinese: 如何重塑天字码头的景观内涵是本文所要讨论的问题。

sentences.english: Mr Cameron set out to rebrand the Tories as kinder and greener. It worked.
sentences.chinese: 卡麦隆着手重塑保守党的形象，使其更加友善和环保。

sentences.english: Have the imagination and zeal to re-create yourself daily.
sentences.chinese: 拥有重塑每日自我的想象和热情。

sentences.english: China has also moved to re-brand China itself.
sentences.chinese: 中国也开始重塑自己的品牌。

sentences.english: So there is trying to restore it, they've been trying to restore it.
sentences.chinese: 所以就有重塑巴勒斯坦身份的尝试，有人这么尝试。

sentences.english: The earth is reconstructing its tomorrow by its unbreakable power of life.
sentences.chinese: 地球用它摧枯拉朽的生命力，不断重塑着自己的明天。

sentences.english: The compression test and triaxial test of the original loess and remolded loess are carried out.
sentences.chinese: 本文进行了原状黄土和重塑黄土的压缩和三轴试验。

sentences.english: Now, Wall Street is being reshaped by the crisis over mortgage-related securities.
sentences.chinese: 现在华尔街由于抵押相关证券的风险被重塑。

sentences.english: This remodling process is involved in the formation and development of atheroma .
sentences.chinese: 这个重塑过程贯穿整个斑块形成与发展的全过程。

sentences.english: Much of the innovation reshaping our world comes from the private sector.
sentences.chinese: 许多重塑这个世界的革新来自于私营部门。

sentences.english: To reshape the glass, it must be continually reheated to stay soft.
sentences.chinese: 重塑的玻璃，它必须不断地加热到留软。

sentences.english: Here are four steps to restoring honor and dignity to the American bed.
sentences.chinese: 这里有四个步骤可重塑美国人婚居的尊严。

sentences.english: Three decades of this work have rejiggered his perceptual apparatus.
sentences.chinese: 三十年的驾驶工作经历已重塑他的感知系统。

sentences.english: Enlightenment education is also crucial to rebuild modern educational legal idea.
sentences.chinese: 重塑现代教育法律观，启蒙教育也至为关键。

definition: to give a new lease of life/to reconstruct/to reform/to rework/to recycle/to reproduce (copies, or offspring)/restoration/restructuring
to topple (i.e. knock over)/to capsize/fig. to overturn (a regime, by plotting or subversion)/to undermine/to subvert
to model/to mold/(fig.) to create (a character, a market, an image etc)/(literature) to portray (in words)
to restore (sth) to (its) former condition/to recover from illness/recovery
to restore/to renovate/restoration/(computing) to fix (a bug)
to create/to build/to develop/to forge (of metal)
a mixture/an amalgam/fusion/welding together/to be in harmony with (nature)/to harmonize with/to fit in
